description: This clean, trim fit, ankle pant has a reflective inseam cuff for extra visibility and a secure zip pocket sized to fit your phone. As always, Ferrosi is the perfect softshell for lightweight, durable, stretchy, UPF 50+ weather resistance in an idea spring and summer weight for climbing, hiking, and multi-sport days. Plus, an eco-friendly fabric that's 46% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Transit Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Bluesign® approved 46% Recycled Nylon, 40% Nylon, 14% Spandex
